hints.label: thm-composition-standalone
hints.title: Composition of Kinetic and Cloning Operators
hints.content:
540: :label: thm-composition-standalone
541: 
542: For the composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{clone}} \circ \Psi_{\text{kin}}$:
543: 
544: $$
545: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
546: $$
547: 
548: where:
549: $$
550: C_{\text{total}} = C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2})
hints.raw_directive:
537: ## Section 3: Composition
538: 
539: :::{prf:theorem} Composition of Kinetic and Cloning Operators
540: :label: thm-composition-standalone
541: 
542: For the composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{clone}} \circ \Psi_{\text{kin}}$:
543: 
544: $$
545: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
546: $$
547: 
548: where:
549: $$
550: C_{\text{total}} = C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2})
551: $$

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-17
hints.content:
555: :::{prf:proof}
556: 
557: **Step 1**: Apply kinetic operator:
558: 
559: $$
560: \mu_t \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{kin}}} \mu_{t+1/2}
561: $$
562: 
563: By Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-kinetic-lsi-standalone`:
564: 
565: $$
566: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
567: $$
568: 
569: **Step 2**: Apply cloning operator:
570: 
571: $$
572: \mu_{t+1/2} \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{clone}}} \mu_{t+1}
573: $$
574: 
575: By Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-cloning-contraction-standalone`:
576: 
577: $$
578: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
579: $$
580: 
581: **Step 3**: Compose:
582: 
583: $$
584: \begin{aligned}
585: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) [(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)] + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2) \\
586: &= (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}})(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
587: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}) + \tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
588: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
589: \end{aligned}
590: $$
591: 
592: where we absorbed $\tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}$ into $O(\tau^2)$.
593:
hints.raw_directive:
553: :::
554: 
555: :::{prf:proof}
556: 
557: **Step 1**: Apply kinetic operator:
558: 
559: $$
560: \mu_t \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{kin}}} \mu_{t+1/2}
561: $$
562: 
563: By Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-kinetic-lsi-standalone`:
564: 
565: $$
566: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
567: $$
568: 
569: **Step 2**: Apply cloning operator:
570: 
571: $$
572: \mu_{t+1/2} \xrightarrow{\Psi_{\text{clone}}} \mu_{t+1}
573: $$
574: 
575: By Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-cloning-contraction-standalone`:
576: 
577: $$
578: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1/2} \| \pi) + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2)
579: $$
580: 
581: **Step 3**: Compose:
582: 
583: $$
584: \begin{aligned}
585: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}}) [(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)] + C_{\text{ent}} + O(e^{-\kappa \delta^2}) + O(\tau^2) \\
586: &= (1 - \tau \beta_{\text{clone}})(1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
587: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}) + \tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2) \\
588: &= [1 - \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})] D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} + O(\tau^2)
589: \end{aligned}
590: $$
591: 
592: where we absorbed $\tau^2 \alpha_{\text{kin}} \beta_{\text{clone}}$ into $O(\tau^2)$.
593: 
594: $\square$
